===Overview===
'''Buffalo Bill's Wild West Show''' is a traveling circus formed by [[William Cody (Earth-616)|Buffalo Bill]] one of the most famous and well-known figures of the American Old West. They perform in shows that displayed cowboy themes and episodes from the frontier.{{r|Blaze of Glory Vol 1 1}}

===Events===
The [[Jonathan Clay (Earth-616)|Rawhide Kid]] joined the troop for a time.{{r|Blaze of Glory Vol 1 1}}

The [[Eternals (Homo immortalis)|Eternal]]; [[Gilgamesh (Earth-616)|Gilgamesh]] joined Buffalo Bill's [[Buffalo Bill's Wild West Show (Earth-616)|Wild West Show]] picking up a few tricks along the way.{{r|Avengers Spotlight Vol 1 35}}
